messages.thereIsProblemToken: NEW - There is problem with the token unlock. Try to revoke previous approval if any on https://revoke.cash/
messages.impossibleToPerform: NEW - Impossible to perform the operation. Reload the application and try again.
messages.pleaseConfirmYouWouldLike: NEW - Please confirm you would like to remove this list by typing REMOVE
messages.yourTransactionMayBeFrontrun: NEW - Your transaction may be frontrun

recentTransactionsModal.title: NEW - Recent Transactions
recentTransactionsModal.pleaseConnectWallet: NEW - Please connect your wallet to view your recent transactions

bridge.toGetStarted: NEW - To get started, connect your wallet.
bridge.toAccessTheBridge: NEW - To access the {{fromTokenSymbol}} > {{toTokenSymbol}} bridge, please switch to
bridge.pleaseSwitchNetwork: NEW - Please switch the network in your wallet to {{networkToLabel}}
bridge.afterYouSwitchNetworks: NEW - After you switch networks, you will complete a second transaction on {{shortedNetworkLabel}} to claim your {{tokenSymbol}} tokens.
bridge.confirmTheTransaction: NEW - Confirm the transaction in your wallet
bridge.pleaseConfirmThat: NEW - Please confirm that you would like to send {{amountsFrom}} {{tokenSymbol}} from {{networkFromLabel}} and receive {{amountsTo}} {{tokenSymbol}} on {{networkToLabel}}
bridge.theClaimProcess: NEW - The claim process requires 2 transactions, one on {{networkFromLabel}} and one on {{networkToLabel}}

swap.headerDescription: NEW - Trade tokens in an instant
swap.findTokenBySearching: NEW - Find a token by searching for its name or symbol or by pasting its address below.
swap.tokenSearchPlaceholder: NEW - Search name or paste address
swap.insufficientLiquidityForThisTrade: NEW - Insufficient liquidity for this trade.
swap.walletAddressOrEnsName: NEW - Wallet address or ens name
swap.addAListQuestionHelper: NEW - Token lists are an open specification for lists of BEP20 tokens. You can use any token list by entering its URL below. Beware that third party token lists can contain fake or malicious BEP20 tokens.
swap.listSelectInputPlaceholder: NEW - https:// or ipfs:// or ENS name
swap.yourTransactionWillRevert: NEW - Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
swap.theDifferenceBetween: NEW - The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
swap.forEachTradeAFeeIsPaid: NEW - For each trade a 0.25% fee is paid. 0.20% goes to liquidity providers and 0.05% goes to the AliumSwap treasury.
swap.routingThroughThese: NEW - Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.

settingsModal.transactionRevert: NEW - Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
settingsModal.transactionRevertPending: NEW - Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.

liquidity.headerDescription: NEW - Add liquidity to receive LP tokens
liquidity.whenYouAddLiquidity: NEW - When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
liquidity.liquidityConnectToWallet: NEW - Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
liquidity.noJoinedPool: NEW - Don't see a pool you joined?
liquidity.lpTokensInYourWallet: NEW - LP Tokens in your Wallet
liquidity.useThisTool: NEW - Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface
liquidity.removeTokens: NEW - Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
liquidity.selectToFindLiquidity: NEW - Select a token to find your liquidity.
liquidity.youAreTheFirstLiquidity: NEW - You are the first liquidity provider.
liquidity.theRatioOfTokens: NEW - The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
liquidity.onceYouAreHappy: NEW - Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
liquidity.initialPricesAndPoolShare: NEW - Initial prices and pool share
liquidity.connectToFindPools: NEW - Connect to a wallet to find pools
liquidity.noLiquidityInPool: NEW - You don’t have liquidity in this pool yet.
liquidity.confirmThisTransaction: NEW - Confirm this transaction in your wallet
